title: 3 drug dealers held at Ashulia
body: The police at Ashulia, on the outskirts of Dhaka, have arrested three suspected drug dealers and seized 110 Yaba tablets in two separate raids, officials said on Sunday. The arrests were made late Saturday night at the Baipail and Palashbari areas, officer-in-charge of the Detective Branch (North) of Dhaka district police Jalal Uddin said. Police identified the detainees as Mahmudul Hasan Munna, 20, from Dinajpur, Al Islam, 28, from Munshiganj, and Saddam Hossain, 32, also from Munshiganj. All three were living in different neighbourhoods of Ashulia at the time of arrests. Acting on a tip-off, one police team detained Munna with 50 Yaba tablets in Baipail, while another team arrested Al Islam and Saddam Hossain in Palashbari with 60 Yaba tablets, Jalal Uddin said. He added that cases were filed against the suspects under the Narcotics Control Act at Ashulia Police Station, and they were handed over to the police station authorities.
